summary: Provides migration scripts to upgrade the database from version 0.11.0 to 0.12.0, including a revamp of model tables, cleansing of organization references, and conversion of legacy image metadata to the new image schema, as well as removal of the obsolete organization model and related collections.
business_intent: Facilitate a seamless application upgrade by restructuring the data model, eliminating deprecated organization entities, and preserving existing data through transformation, thereby maintaining data integrity and supporting new features in version 0.12.0.
